attributes.action: Get Aldi and Lidl to stock Quark again.
attributes.additional_details: Get them to stock it again.
attributes.background: Aldi and Lidl have stopped stocking Quark, an affordable and tasty option for pudding. This is where lots of people shop and we don't want to have to go to Tesco or Asda to just get Quark.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a commercial decision for the organisations you mention.

We also can't accept petitions relating to specific organisations or individuals, outside of the UK Government or Parliament.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
